thread.title: Real Madrid president Florentino Perez claims ‘someone is messing’ with Manchester United keeper David de Gea over potential move
thread.title_full: Real Madrid president Florentino Perez claims ‘someone is messing’ with Manchester United keeper David de Gea over potential move

author: leeastley
title: Real Madrid president Florentino Perez claims ‘someone is messing’ with Manchester United keeper David de Gea over potential move
text:
David de Gea has hinted he wants to move to Real Madrid after saying he is uncertain about his United future See Manchester United goalkeeper David de Gea make a string of great saves 
But Perez refused to deny the reports but did say everyone at the club is happy with current No1 Keylor Navas. 
Keep up to date with ALL the MANCHESTER UNITED news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Perez said: "Someone is messing around there with De Gea. 
"We're not going to deny everything that comes out about transfers. 
"We won't work on any signing until the end of the season. Everyone is really happy with Keylor Navas." 
De Gea was on the verge of a move to the Spanish capital in August 2015 but late paperwork saw him stay at Old Trafford. Getty Images 3 Florentino Perez refused to rule out a move for Manchester United keeper David de Gea 
The Spanish international then penned a new five-year-deal at the club but fuelled reports he could return to Madrid where he spent time at Atletico. 
Chelsea keeper Thibaut Courtois has also been on Real's radar as reports in Spain suggested they were not convinced with Navas. Watch the Spanish squad struggle to score against David De Gea in Euro 2016 training related stories 'The future, no one knows' Man United ace David de Gea fuels speculation over a move to Real Madrid this summer Not Donn and dusted Real Madrid to turn to Gianluigi Donnarumma if they can't get Thibaut Courtois or David De Gea second gea Juventus want to sign David de Gea from Manchester United if they fail to get Gianluigi Donnarumma GLOVES ARE OFF David de Gea and Thibaut Courtois in battle to replace Keylor Navas as Real Madrid No1 BRACE YOURSELF Paul Pogba prepares for Man Utd's match with Watford by showing off his gold braces... as David De Gea reveals his new glasses at training Getty Images 3 David de Gea signed a five-year deal at Old Trafford in 2015 after a failed move to Real Madrid 
And Courtoi s has not hidden his willingness to leave Chelsea and go back to Spain at some point. 
Neither Chelsea nor United will roll over and let their first-choice keepers leave without a fight, but Courtois, 24, and De Gea, 26, could choose to force the issue. Manchester United goalkeeper David De Gea headbangs at heavy metal gig
